subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: No. 2 Novak Djokovic maintained his unbeaten record in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates, by beating third-ranked David Ferrer, 7-5, 6-2.
snippet: No. 2 Novak Djokovic maintained his unbeaten record in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates, by beating third-ranked David Ferrer, 7-5, 6-2.
